#summary &or; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &or;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Or;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a54/index.htm U+02A54].
  * `&or;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2228/index.htm U+02228].
